details.title: Ultrawideband radar special features & terminology
details.abstract: UWB radar has evolved in the fifteen years since DARPA proposed the present frequency-based definition. We suggest the UWB radar definition should reflect the physical features and practical applications. We propose a revised definition: an ultra wideband radar is a radar set which has a range resolution (Δr) much smaller than the target length L along the radiated direction.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
